Description: The top rallycross variant formerly known as RX Supercar, competes in formerly World RX and now ERX. Equipped with H4DPF 2.0L i4 engine, 3.4 bar anti-lag turbo with 45mm restrictor, mechanical center LSD and 5-speed sequential gearbox. Converted from Rally2 spec, RX1 spec has about 300mm of damper travel and 355mm brake discs
